DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY BRIEFLY
DOC.TEXT: GB Foods Corp. : The Anaheim firm said it has settled outstanding litigation with 13 franchisees who alleged in March , 1993 , that the company had failed to properly disclose information about GB Foods ' restaurant business . GB Foods , the parent company of the Green Burrito restaurant_chain , said Wednesday that it agreed to pay $ 280 # 000 to the disgruntled franchisees . GB Foods also agreed to take_over a franchise store in La Crescenta , Calif . The settlement ended lawsuits brought by the franchisees as well as a suit filed by GB Foods .
